pizzerias.name: Pizza Slice
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Paradise (tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, fresh pineapple, jalapeño)
pizzerias.description: New York-style pizza by the slice in the heart of Ebisu. Their Hawaiian Paradise pizza adds jalapeños for a spicy kick to balance the sweetness of the pineapple.

pizzerias.name: PST Pizza Studio Tamaki
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas Special (San Marzano tomatoes, fior di latte, prosciutto cotto, caramelized pineapple)
pizzerias.description: Acclaimed pizzeria run by Tsubasa Tamaki, who trained under legendary pizzaiolo Susumu Kakinuma. Their pineapple pizza uses caramelized fruit for enhanced flavor and balance.

pizzerias.name: Savoy Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Tropical Naples (tomato sauce, mozzarella, Italian ham, fresh pineapple, basil)
pizzerias.description: Local pizza institution started by the owner of Seirinkan, featuring Neapolitan-style pizzas with a Japanese touch. Their Hawaiian offering uses fresh, not canned, pineapple for superior flavor.
